text: Anante'ma vuteno keana, kasefa kini nera zamagra zamavuzmavapima nehazaza huno, ra mono nomofo avuga noma vazisgama hu'nea zafamofo tva'onte oti'nege'za, ana tvaoma'arera ufema neraza vahe'ene, sondia kva vahe'ene oti'za mani'nage'za maka vahe'mo'za ufe nere'za musenkase nehazageno zamage'ne. Anama nezmageno'a anante Atalia'a kukena'a tagatotagatu nehuno anage huno kezatine, tamagra havi vahe'mota komoru huta nagri nazeri atre'za nehaze.
